/usr/bin/g++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/playground.dir/playground/playground.cpp.o CMakeFiles/playground.dir/common/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/playground.dir/common/controls.cpp.o CMakeFiles/playground.dir/playground/include/Mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/playground.dir/playground/include/Noisemap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/playground.dir/playground/include/PerlinNoise.cpp.o  -o playground -lGL -lGLU external/glfw-3.1.2/src/libglfw3.a external/libGLEW_1130.a -lGL -lGLU -lXrandr -lXext -lX11 -lrt -ldl -lrt -lm -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -ldl -lrt -lm -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -lGLU
